data.title: Mowing Together
data.statement:
We have three people: Adam, Bob and Christian.
They have to mow a great field.

Adam and Bob can do the job together in X minutes.
Adam and Christian can do the same job together in Y minutes.
Bob and Christian can do the same job together in Z minutes.

Find out, how much time it takes for all three of them together, to mow the lawn.
We only count minutes, if they started a minute, it's a minute (ceiling).

Note: They all have their own tools, and work the same rate if working alone, or with one or more others.
data.stubGenerator:
read X:int
read Y:int
read Z:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[X]] for the Minutes it takes for Adam and Bob to mow the lawn
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[Y]] for the Minutes it takes for Adam and Christian to mow the lawn
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[Z]] for the Minutes it takes for Bob and Christian to mow the lawn
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> Time in minutes (round up, if needed), to mow the lawn for all three of them.
